title: Patch 5.13 - In game screen is zoomed in
body: Ok so since the 5.13 patch update my screen in game screen is zoomed in, for example when i go to Dragon, the dragon pit pretty much takes my whole screen and it never used to be like that, my resolution is 1920x1080, i have tried restore to the default settings in game and that still doesnt fix it, i'm not a big computer wizz and would like some help please!

replies.body: have you tried scrolling out with the mouse wheel?
Sorry, i only just seen this and yes i have
Did you ever find a fix to this???
